attributes.action: Stop the injustice of the xl American bully
attributes.additional_details: I have my own 2 year old xl bully kenzo that is the most loving and soft dog you will ever meet. He would not hurt a fly. He has never once shown signs of aggression. Our xl bully’s are not to blame it’s the the owners. That are using the breed as an accessory and not giving the dog any love or training. These people don’t care about the dog all they care about is looking “big, hard and scary” therefore they are actively training the dog to be aggressive to show off. All these attacks are no fault of the dogs only bad owners that should not be Allowed to own animals. Please sign and stop this beautiful soft and loving breed being banned
attributes.background: Do not ban the xl American bully due to the negligence of unfit owners that are not training and showing love to this loving and soft breed. It’s the owners not the breed these unfit people are using this beautiful breed as an accessory and training them to be aggressive #saveourbullys

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
